text: The quality of the business school specialist diploma for supply chain management is bad. Some of the lecture notes are 2017 year old. Some of lecturers do not have in deep knowledge of the subjects. They are freelancers. I took this course in Oct 2024. A page of the lecture notes as shown. It still shows blackberry.
Near to food court. Clear directions. Has toilets, vending machines, rubbish bins, and lifts hence handicapped accessible. Has a carpark nearby.
Gate from the Grassroots leading to Nanyang Polytechnic. Opens only from 12noon to 2pm only.
Learnt much on the Human Resource Management and the dedication of the lecturers who taught and teaching me..

Parking fee as shown.
Environment is great for studying.
